actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Henry Brown, Byron R. Buchanan, Arthur Canady, Robert E. Carter, Edwin L. Clickner, William F. Cummings, Edward F. Fuller, Wilbur Geathers, Donell E. Gourdine, David D. Lorick, Martin N. Olmeda, Lawrence E. Riley, Dean W. Sabo, Leon T. Scarborough, George B. Stone, and Paul K. Vincent.

summary.text: Relieves certain named individuals of all liability to repay the United States certain specified sums overpaid such individuals due to the administrative error of the U.S. Navy.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Henry Brown, Byron R. Buchanan, Arthur Canady, Robert E. Carter, Edwin L. Clickner, William F. Cummings, Edward F. Fuller, Wilbur Geathers, Donell E. Gourdine, David D. Lorick, Martin N. Olmeda, Lawrence E. Riley, Dean W. Sabo, Leon T. Scarborough, George B. Stone, and Paul K. Vincent.
